Getting Started

Neptuno is just a simple CSS library with a set of components that We use in our works and side projects.

We always use components, neptuno components are UI Beauty and UX friendly, not all devs like to use big frameworks like Bootstrap or Materialize. Sometimes we need simple things to build simple apps.

With Neptuno you can use simple responsive components with your custom CSS files.

CDN

You can use our CDN or download the library. 

 <!-- Compiled and minified CSS -->
 <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdn.cloudfire/neptuno/neptuno.css" />
